title: your account has been logged into from another computer...
body:
title. Game closes once i finish a game,  game is won or lost, no lobby after the game, just the message, someone logged into my account from another pc. After logging in its fine again for 1 - few games, until same problem occures. It startet after the latest patch with new masteries. From time to time after one of those crashes, when i log in same message appears, and instantly closes my game after i just started it. The only solution to log in is to kill all LoL processes per task - manager. After that i can log in and play a game or two, just to get kicked out at the end of game. Did not get kicked out during a match even once, only at the end, when the lobby should occure, or while logging in after such game crash.
What i have done so far:
1 - changed password
2 - reinstalled the game
3 - killed everything on my pc and reinstalled windows
nothing helps, it seems to be on the games side

replies.body:
I have the same issue.
Game ends and closes my client and launcher and tells me "game was logged in from another computer."

I have recently changed my password too.
Malwarebyte and Windows Defender gives me clean result.

Hey this is a really strange issue!  This might not be a client problem but suspicious activity potentially happening on the account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help you out with this directly.  In the meantime, the account has been locked as a security measure to protect it.
